environment_variables.bash_dir: Directory containing bash scripts used by this script
environment_variables.gmx_lmod: File containing the modules to load Gromacs
environment_variables.system: The name of the system to analyze
environment_variables.begin: First frame to read from trajectory in ps
environment_variables.end: Last frame to read from trajectory in ps
environment_variables.dt: Only write frame when t MOD dt = first time
environment_variables.zmin: Only atoms in a slab in the xy-plane between zmin
